Verify the 'Add to Cart' button is visible, enabled, has background color rgb(0,128,0), text color #ffffff, font size 16px, font family 'Arial', font weight 600, border radius 8px, padding 12px 20px, width 180px, height 48px
Verify the 'Add to Cart' button transitions background color in 200ms on focus

Verify the 'Email' input field is visible, displays placeholder text 'your@example.com', has no value, measures width 300px, height 40px, features a 1px solid border #cccccc, background color #f8f8f8, font size 14px, text color #333333, aria-label 'Email address input', padding 10px 12px, margin bottom 15px

Verify the main product image has source 'product_main.jpg', rendered dimensions 600x450px, natural dimensions 1200x900px, loaded within 500ms, alt text 'Premium product image', positioned at x 50px, y 100px, opacity 1.0, and no watermark
Verify the video player width 800px, height 450px, located at x 100px, y 150px, initially muted, and not in fullscreen mode
Verify the 'Play' button is visible, has background color #ff0000, color #ffffff, circular shape with radius 20px, and transitions background color in 300ms
Verify the 'Dashboard' navigation link displays text 'Dashboard', has text color #333333, font size 15px, font weight 500, padding 10px 15px, margin left 5px
Verify the 'Dashboard' navigation link on hover changes background color to #f0f0f0 within 150ms and shows a 2px solid bottom border in #007bff
Verify the 'Dashboard' navigation link is selected when active
Verify the 'Confirm Deletion' modal is visible, has width 400px, height 250px, background color #ffffff, border radius 12px, centered horizontally and vertically, opacity 1.0, and padding 20px
Verify the 'Confirm Deletion' modal appears with a transition duration of 300ms for opacity and position

Verify the first data table row has height 50px, background color #f9f9f9, text color #444444, font size 14px, padding 8px, 1px solid bottom border #eeeeee, contains exactly 5 cells with text aligned left and font weight 400, y position 0px relative to table, and width 100% of parent

Verify the price range slider displays current value '250', has width 200px, height 8px, is visible, enabled, with filled track background color #007bff, unfilled track background color #e0e0e0, and aria-label 'Price range selector'
Verify the price range slider thumb has border radius 50% and transitions position over 200ms on focus
Verify the 'Remember Me' checkbox is visible, enabled, not selected, has label 'Remember Me', width 16px, height 16px, positioned at x 10px, y 10px
Verify the 'Remember Me' checkbox when selected changes background color to #007bff, has a 1px solid border #007bff, and aria-label 'Persist login state'
Verify the error message 'Invalid email format' is initially hidden

Verify the error message 'Invalid email format' becomes visible with color #dc3545, font size 13px, font weight 500, padding 5px 0px, margin-top 5px below the input field, and x position aligned with the input's left edge
Verify the error message 'Invalid email format' animates its opacity from 0 to 1 over 250ms
Scroll down the page to scroll-top 200px

Verify the header remains visible, fixed at top 0px, maintains height 60px, has background color #ffffff, opacity 1.0, no unexpected animation or transition on width, and left and right positions remain 0px

Verify the shopping cart notification badge displays count '3', has text color #ffffff, background color #ff0000, font size 12px, border radius 50%, width 24px, height 24px, is visible, and positioned relative to the cart icon at x 18px, y -8px
Verify the shopping cart notification badge appears with a 150ms scale animation

Verify the 'Details' tab displays text 'Details', is selected, has background color #ffffff, text color #007bff, font size 16px, padding 10px 15px, 2px solid bottom border #007bff, width 100px, height 40px, horizontally aligned left within its container, and aria-label 'Product details tab'
Click the user profile icon

Verify the user profile dropdown menu becomes visible, has width 200px, height 150px, background color #ffffff, border radius 6px, positioned top 50px, right 10px relative to the profile icon, contains exactly 4 menu items, and has a 1px solid border #cccccc
Verify the user profile dropdown menu opacity animates from 0 to 1 over 200ms

Verify the file upload progress bar is visible, displays a value of 75%, has width 300px, height 10px, background color #28a745 for filled part and #e9ecef for track, border radius 5px, animates width changes over 100ms, aria-label 'File upload progress', and located at x 20px, y 50px
Verify the tooltip for the info icon is initially hidden

Verify the tooltip appears with text 'More information here', background color #333333, text color #ffffff, font size 12px, padding 8px 12px, border radius 4px, and positioned top 20px, left 10px relative to the icon
Verify the tooltip fades in with opacity 0 to 1 over 150ms

Verify the search icon has source 'search_icon.svg', width 24px, height 24px, alt text 'Search button icon', color #666666, is visible, located at x 5px, y 5px relative to its container, opacity 1.0, and aria-label 'Search'
Verify the search icon applies a 50ms transition for color on hover

Verify the date input field in the date picker shows value '2023-10-26', has placeholder 'Select a date', background color #ffffff, 1px solid border #cccccc, font size 14px, text color #333333, width 150px, height 36px, is enabled, focused, and aria-label 'Date selection input'
Verify the top banner ad is visible, has background color #f0f8ff, height 80px, width 100% of the viewport, margin-top 0px, and padding 10px 20px
Verify the top banner ad animates its appearance with a slide-down animation over 300ms
Verify the 'Close' button within the top banner ad is located at x 95%, y 10% (relative to banner top-right), has text color #333333, and font size 14px
Verify the 'Read More' link displays text 'Read More', has color #007bff, font size 15px, font weight 500, no text decoration, padding 5px, margin-right 10px, and aria-label 'Link to more details'
Verify the 'Read More' link on focus changes color to #0056b3 and a 1px solid bottom border in #0056b3 appears over 100ms
